# GKSavedGameListener

**Protocol**

A protocol that handles events related to saving game data.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol GKSavedGameListener : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

Implement the methods in the this protocol to manage conflicts or track changes when saving game data.

Adopt the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLocalPlayerListener] protocol to listen for and handle a variety of Game Center events for player accounts instead of the individual [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKChallengeListener], [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKInviteEventListener], [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSavedGameListener], and [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventListener] protocols.

## Handling Saved Game Conflicts

- **player(_:hasConflictingSavedGames:)**: Chooses the correct game data from the saved games that contain conflicts.

## Handling Saved Game Changes

- **player(_:didModifySavedGame:)**: Handles when data changes in a saved game file.

## Saving Game Data

- **Saving the player’s game data to an iCloud account**: Save game data during play or after a game in the player’s iCloud account that’s accessible from any device.
- **saveGameData(_:withName:completionHandler:)**: Saves game data with the specified name.
- **fetchSavedGames(completionHandler:)**: Retrieves all available saved games.
- **resolveConflictingSavedGames(_:with:completionHandler:)**: Replaces duplicate saved games that use the same filename with one file containing the specified game data.
- **deleteSavedGames(withName:completionHandler:)**: Deletes saved games with the specified filename.
- **GKSavedGame**: An object that represents a file containing saved game data.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

## Inherited By

- GKLocalPlayerListener

## Conforming Types

- GKLocalPlayer
